113.content: What Type OF Experiment Happened To Make Dexter's Mom's Butt Bigger and sexier that it Is
113.title: Butt expansion.

choices: It found it's way into the kitchen
1131.content:
Dexter was tweaking away at his newest raygun, the growth a tron 2000, when his big sister once again DeeDee bypassed the newest security that he had installed.
"Whatcha working on dork?" She asked the boy genius
"Waaah- DeeDee! You foolish garl! Had I not uzed proper safety precawtions, I could have zapped you with my growth a tron 2000!" Dexter yelled at her
"Ooooooh... a growth a tron 2000! What's it do?" She asked
"Why, wit dis raygun anyting I shoot will triple in size. Ze tiniest of rowbots will become ze mightiest of mechs!" Dexter boasted
"If I use that on my patty pocket dollhouse then I could have a life size dollhouse. I could invite all my friends and we could have the best tea parties!" DeeDee exclaimed
"Excuse me, dex. I just have to borrow that for a sec."
Before Dexter had a chance to respond DeeDee yoinked it out of his hands
"You stoopid garl! Zhat iz still a prrototype! You half no idea what it could dew!" He said shouted as he chased after her

Using a shortcut, Dexter beats her upstairs.
"Gimme back mah rraygun, you buffoonish garl!" Dexter commanded, trying to grab the gun
"No! I need this so I can have lifesize patty pocket tea parties with all my friends." DeeDee replied, pulling the gun away.
For the next minute, they struggled to gain control of the situation. In the midst of the pushing and pulling the gun, accidentally went off. They stood, frozen in awe as the beam miraculously seemed to only hit reflective surfaces. It ricocheted off of everything from windows to picture frames to the tv set until
1131.title: A Simple Misfire Of A Growth Ray

11312.content: It ricocheted off of everything from windows to picture frames to the tv set until it found it's way into the kitchen. Mom had been doing the dishes when she felt a bizarre tingle go up her spine. Of course she was completely oblivious to the flash of the light behind her and didn't even notice the laser that her rear just absorbed
11312.title: It found it's way into the kitchen

113122.content:
Dexter and DeeDee peaked around the corner expecting the worst only to be surprised. They found their mom humming away while washing dishes, nothing had changed.
"Dat waz a close won. Luckey fore us that was just a prrototype." Dexter said with a slight relief
"But now I'll never have a life size patty pocket tea party. Way to dissapoint a girl, dex." DeeDee whined
DeeDee and dexter sulk back to their rooms while mom continues on with her dishes, each of them completely oblivious to the growing problem at hand. Not long after, every movement she made sent a ripple that slowly pushed her ass outward. As if her behind wasn't massive enough, pretty soon the fabric of her jeans stretched and pulled to a max capacity until they could no longer contain themselves.

Shhhhhrrrrrrrrrrrkkkk

Mom immediately covered her behind hoping that nobody saw her pants rip. Daring to peak, she saw that her jeans were completely in tatters. With nothing else to do, she begins to...
113122.title: Mom's butt slowly starts growing
